verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Moyo wangu funguka,
iye iye iyelelele iye,
moyo wangu kunjuka,
moyo wangu funguka. x2
Kufuli la moyo,
legea kidogo,
ili Bwana Yesu
aingie moyoni. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
(Wataka kitu gani wewe moyo)
ili ufunguke
(Bwana Yesu apate kuingia) leo
(Niimbe wimbo gani wewe moyo)
ili ufunguke
(Bwana Yesu apate kuingia) leo.
Moyo moyo moyo
wangu funguka.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nionee huruma wewe moyo,
moyo wangu tulia kwa Yesu
moyo wangu moyo funguka.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fungua masikio wewe moyo,
Bwana Yesu anabisha hodi hodi
hodi moyo funguka.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kwenye uvungu wako
wewe moyo vumbi
limetawala moyoni
ufisadi ushirikina.
